change.item: pp. 2, 5, Haslinger = publisher; p. 7, Schott = publisher
sic and unclear moved outside elements pubplaces, publisher, composer, hofclass, key, opus
Corrections following checking pages. Fixed title/opus tagging.

Wüerst, Rich., mit Facsimile. Nach einer Photographie lith. von C. Ulrich. gr.-4. Berlin, Bahn 20 Ngr. n.
